io.janusproject

Class Bootstrap

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.janusproject.Bootstrap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SREBootstrap

    public final class Bootstrap
extends Object
implements SREBootstrap
    Represents an access point to the SARL run-time environment (SRE).
    Since:
    0.6
    Version:
    0.9.0 2019-04-15 23:03:18
    Author:
    Stéphane Galland
    Maven Group Id:
    io.janusproject
    Maven Artifact Id:
    io.janusproject.plugin

      Bootstrap()

    • Method Detail

      • startAgent

        public def startAgent(agentCls : Class<? extends Agent>,
                      params : Object*) : UUID 
               throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Launch the SRE and the first agent in the kernel.

        The function SREBootstrap.getBootAgentIdentifier() permits to retrieve the identifier of the launched agent.

        Specified by:
        startAgent in interface SREBootstrap
        Parameters:
        agentCls - type of the first agent to launch.
        params - parameters to pass to the agent as its initialization parameters.
        Returns:
        the identifier of the created agent.
        Throws:
        Exception - - if it is impossible to start the platform.
        See Also:
        SREBootstrap.getBootAgentIdentifier()

      • startAgent

        public def startAgent(nbAgents : int,
                      agentCls : Class<? extends Agent>,
                      params : Object*) : Iterable<UUID> 
               throws Exception
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Launch the SRE and the first agent in the kernel.

        The function SREBootstrap.getBootAgentIdentifier() permits to retrieve the identifier of the launched agent.

        Specified by:
        startAgent in interface SREBootstrap
        Parameters:
        nbAgents - the number of agents to be launched.
        agentCls - type of the first agent to launch.
        params - parameters to pass to the agent as its initialization parameters.
        Returns:
        the identifiers of the created agents.
        Throws:
        Exception - - if it is impossible to start the platform.
        See Also:
        SREBootstrap.getBootAgentIdentifier()

      • getBootAgentIdentifier

        public def getBootAgentIdentifier() : UUID 
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Replies the identifier of the boot agent from the system's properties. The boot agent is launched with SREBootstrap.startAgent(int, Class, Object...).
        Specified by:
        getBootAgentIdentifier in interface SREBootstrap
        Returns:
        the identifier of the boot agent, or null if it is unknown.
        See Also:
        SREBootstrap.startAgent(int, Class, Object...)

      • startWithoutAgent

        public def startWithoutAgent() : AgentContext 
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Start the SRE without an agent. This function prepare the default context.
        Specified by:
        startWithoutAgent in interface SREBootstrap
        Returns:
        the context that is created by the bootstrap. If null there is no context created.

      • setOffline

        public def setOffline(isOffline : boolean) : void 
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Set offline flag of the agent platform before it is launched.

        This function has no effect if the agent framework is already launched.

        Specified by:
        setOffline in interface SREBootstrap
        Parameters:
        isOffline - the offline flag.

      • setRandomContextUUID

        public def setRandomContextUUID() : void 
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Force the SRE platform to use a random identifier for its default context.

        This function has no effect if the agent framework is already launched.

        Specified by:
        setRandomContextUUID in interface SREBootstrap

      • setBootAgentTypeContextUUID

        public def setBootAgentTypeContextUUID() : void 
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Force the SRE platform to use a default context identifier that tis build upon the classname of the boot agent. It means that the UUID is always the same for a given classname.

        This function has no effect if the agent framework is already launched.

        Specified by:
        setBootAgentTypeContextUUID in interface SREBootstrap

      • setSpecificContextUUID

        public def setSpecificContextUUID() : void 
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Force the SRE platform to use the identifier hard-coded in the source code for its default context.

        This function has no effect if the agent framework is already launched.

        Specified by:
        setSpecificContextUUID in interface SREBootstrap
        See Also:
        SREBootstrap.setUniverseContextUUID(UUID), SREBootstrap.getUniverseContextUUID(), SREBootstrap.setUniverseSpaceUUID(UUID), SREBootstrap.getUniverseSpaceUUID()

      • setVerboseLevel

        public def setVerboseLevel(level : int) : void 
        Description copied from interface: SREBootstrap
        Force the verbosity level.

        This function has no effect if the agent framework is already launched.

        Specified by:
        setVerboseLevel in interface SREBootstrap
        Parameters:
        level - the verbosity level.
